Package com.dao

Interface UserDao

All Known Implementing Classes:
UserDaoImpl
public interface UserDao
The UserDao interface represents operations related to managing user entities in a data store. Implementations of this interface provide methods to register new users and perform login operations.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    User
    login​(String email, String password)
    Performs a login operation using the provided email and password.
    boolean
    userRegister​(User user)
    Registers a new user in the data store.

  • Method Details

    • userRegister

      boolean userRegister​(User user)
      Registers a new user in the data store.
      Parameters:
      user - The User object to be registered.
      Returns:
      true if the user is successfully registered, false otherwise.

    • login

      User login​(String email, String password)
      Performs a login operation using the provided email and password.
      Parameters:
      email - The email of the user attempting to log in.
      password - The password of the user attempting to log in.
      Returns:
      The User object representing the logged-in user if login is successful, or null if login fails.
